name: River Boa
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)\n{G}: Regenerate River Boa.
flavor: "But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."\n—Afari, Tales

name: Terror
text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Longbow Archer
text: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: "If it bears wings, I will pin it to the skies over Tefemburu."\n—Roya, Zhalfirin archer

name: Volcanic Geyser
text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.
flavor: My thunder comes before the lightning; my lightning comes before the clouds; my rain dries all the land it touches. What am I? —Femeref riddle

name: Mind Warp
text: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
flavor: The hardest of wizards can have the softest of minds.

name: Shock
text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Lightning tethers souls to the world. —Kor saying

name: Staunch Defenders
text: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor: "Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"\n—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

name: Giant Growth
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Prodigal Sorcerer
text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Stone Rain
text: Destroy target land.

name: Llanowar Elves
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

name: Swords to Plowshares
text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
flavor: "Peace hath her victories No less renownd than war." - John Milton, "To the Lord General Cromwell"

name: Ophidian
text: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor: "I will ... tell thee more than thou hast wit to ask."\n—Christopher Marlowe, Doctor Faustus

name: Jackal Pup
text: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
flavor: "Cry havoc and let slip the dogs of war."\n—William Shakespeare, Julius Caesar

name: Quirion Ranger
text: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: "I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately."\n—Henry David Thoreau, Walden

name: Carnophage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.
flavor: "And in their blind and unattaining state their miserable lives have sunk so low that they must envy every other fate."\n—Dante, Inferno, trans. Ciardi

name: Impulse
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Fireblast
text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost.\nFireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

name: Soltari Priest
text: Protection from red\nShadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: "Fire is the test of gold; adversity of strong men." - Seneca, "On Providence," trans. Basara

name: Albino Troll
text: Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\n{1}{G}: Regenerate Albino Troll.

name: Dissipate
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

name: Black Knight
text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nProtection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
flavor: "The chill, to him who breathed it, drew / Down with his blood, till all his heart was cold."\n—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, Idyls of the King

name: Wall of Blossoms
text: Defender\nWhen Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: "Everything in Nature contains all the powers of Nature." - Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Compensation"

name: Fireslinger
text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
flavor: "One pain is lessened by another's anguish."\n—William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

name: Drain Life
text: Spend only black mana on X.\nDrain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.

name: Aura of Silence
text: Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast.\nSacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Forbid
text: Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nCounter target spell.

name: Spike Feeder
text: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nRemove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

name: Mogg Fanatic
text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "As if his chest had been a mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it."\n—Herman Melville, Moby Dick

name: White Knight
text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nProtection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
flavor: "When good men die their goodness does not perish, / But lives though they are gone."\n—Euripides, Termenidae, trans. Morgan

name: Disenchant
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Bottle Gnomes
text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
flavor: "I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."\n—Karn, silver golem

name: Muscle Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
flavor: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

name: Crystalline Sliver
text: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly-they know they cannot be caught.

name: Capsize
text: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nReturn target permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Priest of Titania
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Elf on the battlefield.
flavor: Titania rewards all who honor the forest by making them a living part of it.

name: Goblin Bombardment
text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

name: Scragnoth
text: Scragnoth can't be countered.\nProtection from blue
flavor: It possesses no intelligence, only counter-intelligence.

name: Smother
text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "I can't hear them scream, but at least I don't have to listen to them beg."\n—Phage the Untouchable

name: Whipcorder
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.\nMorph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: His bolas whirl like galaxies, but it's his enemies who see stars.

name: Sparksmith
text: {T}: Sparksmith deals X damage to target creature and X damage to you, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
flavor: "If it didn't hurt, how would I know it worked?"

name: Krosan Tusker
text: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Withered Wretch
text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

name: Willbender
text: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

name: Slice and Dice
text: Slice and Dice deals 4 damage to each creature.\nCycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Slice and Dice, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature.

name: Silver Knight
text: First strike, protection from red
flavor: Otaria's last defense against the wave of chaos threatening to engulf it.

name: Krosan Warchief
text: Beast spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\n{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
flavor: It turns prey into predator.

name: Lightning Rift
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, Lightning Rift deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Options will cost you, but a lack of options will cost you even more.

name: Carrion Feeder
text: Carrion Feeder can't block.\nSacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
flavor: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

name: Treetop Village
text: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\n{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

name: Accumulated Knowledge
text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.
flavor: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."\n—Takara, to Eladamri

name: Avalanche Riders
text: Haste\nEcho {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\nWhen Avalanche Riders enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

name: Reanimate
text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor: "You will learn to earn death."\n—Volrath

name: Mother of Runes
text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "My family protects all families."

name: Brainstorm
text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor: "I see more than other because I know where to look"\n—Saprazzan vizier

name: Rancor
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.\nWhen Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.
flavor: Hatred outlives the hateful.

name: Seal of Cleansing
text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."\n—Seal inscription

name: Flametongue Kavu
text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor: "For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."\n—Sisay

name: Blastoderm
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nFading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Cabal Therapy
text: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.\nFlashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Fact or Fiction
text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

name: Juggernaut
text: Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.\nJuggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
flavor: Built with neither a way to steer nor a way to stop, the juggernauts were simply aimed at an enemy's best defenses and told to charge.

name: Circle of Protection: Red
text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Kird Ape
text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
flavor: It puts the "fur" in "fury."

name: Duress
text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: "We decide who is worthy of our works."\n—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

name: Counterspell
text: Counter target spell.
flavor: "It was probably a lousy spell in the first place."\n—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Icy Manipulator
text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
flavor: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.

name: Elves of Deep Shadow
text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: "They are aberrations who have turned on everything we hold sacred. Let them be cast out."\n—Ailheen, Speaker of the Council

name: Armadillo Cloak
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: "Don't laugh. It works."\n—Yavimaya ranger

name: Terminate
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: Like his mother before him, Darigaaz gave his life defending Dominaria from the tyranny of self-styled "gods."

name: Lobotomy
text: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

name: Goblin Warchief
text: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\nGoblin creatures you control have haste.
flavor: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

name: Wild Mongrel
text: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: It teaches you to play dead.

name: Chainer's Edict
text: Target player sacrifices a creature.\nFlashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: The pits have their own form of mercy.

name: Circular Logic
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.\nMadness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Astral Slide
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: "The hum of the universe is never off-key."\n—Mystic elder

name: Arrogant Wurm
text: Trample\nMadness {2}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: It's hard to be humble when the whole world is bite size.

name: Life
artist: Edward P. Beard, Jr. & Anthony S. Waters
text: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

name: Death
artist: Edward P. Beard, Jr. & Anthony S. Waters
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

name: Fire
text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

name: Ice
text: Tap target permanent.\nDraw a card.

name: Firebolt
text: Firebolt deals 2 damage to target creature or player.\nFlashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Reach out and torch someone.

name: Deep Analysis
text: Target player draws two cards.\nFlashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: "The specimen seems to be broken."

name: Gerrard's Verdict
text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.
flavor: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

name: Basking Rootwalla
text: {1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.\nMadness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Wonder
text: Flying\nAs long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.
flavor: "The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."\n—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Goblin Legionnaire
text: {R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.\n{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

name: Engineered Plague
text: As Engineered Plague enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nAll creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.
flavor: "The admixture of bitterwort in the viral brew has produced most favorable results."\n—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Goblin Ringleader
text: Haste\nWhen Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Wing Shards
text: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

name: Cabal Coffers
text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.
flavor: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun-and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

name: Roar of the Wurm
text: Put a 6/6 green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield.\nFlashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Force Spike
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

name: Remand
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive.

name: Tormod's Crypt
text: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
flavor: Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.

name: Eternal Witness
text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Gaea needs no book to record every act.

name: Tendrils of Agony
text: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Pendelhaven
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.

name: Resurrection
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "Think of this new life not as a gift from the angels but as a command to fight for their cause once more." —War blessing of Serra

name: Wall of Roots
text: Defender\nPut a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: Root systems in Mwonvuli twist through currents of mana rather than soil.

name: Desert
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the end of combat step.

name: Thirst for Knowledge
text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
flavor: Raissa transformed herself into a vessel for the Watchword Codex, allowing the arcane lore to flow through her body.

name: Serrated Arrows
text: Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.\n{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

name: Isochron Scepter
text: Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand.\n{2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

name: Shrapnel Blast
text: As an additional cost to cast Shrapnel Blast, sacrifice an artifact.\nShrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: To the Krark Clan, every artifact has a trigger and a barrel.

name: Magma Jet
text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Myr Enforcer
text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
flavor: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

name: Kitchen Finks
text: When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.\nPersist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Merrow Reejerey
text: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.
flavor: Steady and silent as the deep current, the reejerey guides the course of the school.

name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
text: As an additional cost to cast Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}.\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Mulldrifter
text: Flying\nWhen Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.\nEvoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Murderous Redcap
text: When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.\nPersist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Lightning Greaves
text: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nEquip {0}
flavor: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

name: Watchwolf
flavor: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

name: Browbeat
text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
flavor: "Even the threat of power has power."\n—Jeska, warrior adept

name: Oblivion Ring
text: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.\nWhen Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor: Slain orochi warriors were buried with a tree sapling so they would become part of the forest after death.

name: Tidehollow Sculler
text: When Tidehollow Sculler enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.\nWhen Tidehollow Sculler leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

name: Ghostly Prison
text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.
flavor: "May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men."\n—Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

name: Ancient Ziggurat
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
flavor: Leylines branch out from its foundation like roots from a tree. These draw mana from every region and welcome all living things into its verdant chambers.

name: Bloodbraid Elf
text: Haste\nCascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Cloudpost
text: Cloudpost enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool for each Locus on the battlefield.
flavor: "He watches from above. He watches from below. He watches from within." -Inscription on Tel-Jilad, the Tree of Tales

name: Elvish Visionary
text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

name: Anathemancer
text: When Anathemancer enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.\nUnearth {5}{B}{R} ({5}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Krosan Grip
text: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)\nDestroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "Give up these unnatural weapons, these scrolls. Heart and mind and fist are enough."\n—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

name: Qasali Pridemage
text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\n{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

name: Rift Bolt
text: Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.\nSuspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
text: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor: "You may enter the city—once the toll is paid."

name: Wild Nacatl
text: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.\nWild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
flavor: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

name: Everflowing Chalice
text: Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nEverflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.\n{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

name: Spellstutter Sprite
text: Flash\nFlying\nWhen Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

name: Wall of Omens
text: Defender\nWhen Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."\n—Expedition journal entry

name: Artisan of Kozilek
text: When you cast Artisan of Kozilek, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.\nAnnihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

name: Squadron Hawk
text: Flying\nWhen Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Rhox War Monk
text: Lifelink
flavor: Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.

name: Jace's Ingenuity
text: Draw three cards.
flavor: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

name: Cultivate
text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Teetering Peaks
text: Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.\n{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

name: Contagion Clasp
text: When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.\n{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

name: Go for the Throat
text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
flavor: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

name: Savage Lands
text: Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

name: Glistener Elf
text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor: "Beg me for life, and I will fill you with the glory of Phyrexian perfection."

name: Despise
text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: "Truth is always a weapon in your enemies' hands."\n—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Tectonic Edge
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Tectonic Edge: Destroy target nonbasic land. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls four or more lands.
flavor: "We move because the earth does."\n—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Dismember
text: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)\nTarget creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor: "You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere."\n—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

name: Ancient Grudge
text: Destroy target artifact.\nFlashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

name: Acidic Slime
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)\nWhen Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

name: Forbidden Alchemy
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.\nFlashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
flavor: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

name: Lingering Souls
text: Put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.\nFlashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

name: Evolving Wilds
text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

name: Pillar of Flame
text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

name: Gitaxian Probe
text: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)\nLook at target player's hand.\nDraw a card.
flavor: "My flesh holds no secrets, monster. The spirit of Mirrodin will fight on."\n—Vy Covalt, Mirran resistance

name: Searing Spear
text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

name: Reliquary Tower
text: You have no maximum hand size.\n{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
flavor: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

name: Farseek
text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

name: Call of the Conclave
text: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

name: Judge's Familiar
text: Flying\nSacrifice Judge's Familiar: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor: "It misses nothing and it has no sense of humor."\n—Barvisa, courtroom scribe

name: Izzet Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

name: Rakdos Cackler
text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: Devil-blades and dripping blood make music Rakdos never tires of hearing.

name: Dimir Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Counter target sorcery spell.
• Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
• Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.
flavor: "Dangerous to recognize. Deadly not to."\n—Lazav

name: Experiment One
text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)\nRemove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
text: Trample\nBloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"\n—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

name: Grisly Salvage
text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

name: Sin Collector
text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.
flavor: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

name: Warleader's Helix
text: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.
flavor: "There is no time to remedy our enemies' ignorance. Blast it out of them."\n—Aurelia

name: Elvish Mystic
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: "Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."\n—Nissa Revane

name: Banisher Priest
text: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
flavor: "Oathbreaker, I cast you out!"

name: Encroaching Wastes
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.
flavor: Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers.

name: Tormented Hero
text: Tormented Hero enters the battlefield tapped.\nHeroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tormented Hero, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

name: Dissolve
text: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"

name: Magma Spray
text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: A stone hurled at an enemy is deadlier in liquid form.

name: Bile Blight
text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: Not an arrow loosed, javelin thrown, nor sword raised. None were needed.

name: Banishing Light
text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)

name: Fanatic of Xenagos
text: Trample\nTribute 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may place a +1/+1 counter on it.)\nWhen Fanatic of Xenagos enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

name: Brain Maggot
text: When Brain Maggot enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until Brain Maggot leaves the battlefield.

name: Stoke the Flames
text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)\nStoke the Flames deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

name: Frenzied Goblin
text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

name: Disdainful Stroke
text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
flavor: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

name: Hordeling Outburst
text: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor: Kolaghan goblins rush into battle to satisfy their desire for violence as well as their desire not to be eaten.

name: Suspension Field
text: When Suspension Field enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until Suspension Field leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

name: Abzan Beastmaster
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.
flavor: His beasts move the great siege towers of the Abzan across the endless sands.

name: Frost Walker
text: When Frost Walker becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor: "As the clans carved out their territories, we saw allies where the Mardu saw only obstacles."\n—Yasova Dragonclaw

name: Path to Exile
text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

name: Serum Visions
text: Draw a card. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Orator of Ojutai
text: As an additional cost to cast Orator of Ojutai, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.\nDefender, flying\nWhen Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Orator of Ojutai, draw a card.

name: Ultimate Price
text: Destroy target monocolored creature.
flavor: "He's paid his price. Now you pay mine."

name: Roast
text: Roast deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.
flavor: The wave of lava seared cloth from skin, skin from flesh, and flesh from bone.

name: Anticipate
text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor: "You thought I wouldn't see that coming?"

name: Nissa's Pilgrimage
text: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.\nSpell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.

name: Clash of Wills
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
flavor: "The mind of an Eldrazi is a puzzle that can never be solved. The trick is to make sure a piece goes missing."\n—Jace Beleren

name: Smash to Smithereens
text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
flavor: "All of these old relics have one thing in common. Every last one of them is made of smithereens."\n—Zada of Slab Haven

name: Blighted Fen
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor: "We came to a place where the skin of Zendikar was peeled back and its bones lay bare to the sky."\n—Greenweaver Mina
